de.larssh.maven.jarrunner

Class JarRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.larssh.maven.jarrunner.JarRunner

  • public final class JarRunner
extends Object
    Launches a new JVM based on a given artifact with optional arguments.

    This is the implementation for RunMojo. The work is done by execute().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JarRunner(Parameters parameters)
      Prepares a command (in form of an internal ProcessBuilder) to launch a new JVM based on a given artifact with optional arguments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JarRunner

        public JarRunner(Parameters parameters)
          throws org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException,
                 org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException,
                 IOException
        Prepares a command (in form of an internal ProcessBuilder) to launch a new JVM based on a given artifact with optional arguments.

        The given artifacts dependencies are resolved and a fully qualified class path is created.

        The main class to execute can either be specified by argument or is taken from the artifacts JAR.

        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters used to create the command
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException - if resolving dependencies failed
        IOException - if any IO failure occurred
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - either if no main class is given and the artifacts JAR does not contain a main class in its manifest or the started application stopped with an exit value not equal to zero

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws IOException
        Launches a new JVM based on the instances command.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO failure occurred

      • getCommandLine

        public String getCommandLine()
        Returns a command to launch this JarRunner.

        The results of this method depend on the Operating System, as command line arguments on Unix and Windows are quoted and escaped differently.

        Returns:
        the escaped command

      • getParameters

        public Parameters getParameters()
        Parameters object maintaining the injected system objects and user arguments of RunMojo
        Returns:
        parameters

      • getProcessBuilder

        public ProcessBuilder getProcessBuilder()
        The command prepared to launch the artifact in a new JVM
        Returns:
        the process builder
